name: Bread Sticks
author: Andrew Chin
summary: Soft bread sticks from frozen dinner roll dough.  These are similar to what many restaurants serve.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated dinner roll dough
directions: Lightly grease one large baking sheet
Roll dough between hands to make a 4-inch long stick
Place sticks on the prepared baking sheet
Brush lightly with egg white or melted butter or margarine
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese or sesame seeds
Cover and allow to rise until doubled in size, about 30 minutes
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 12 minutes or until golden brown
Do not overbake as these burn easily on the bottom
